name: 99.9% Disinfected
description:
As a survivor of the terrible "Kills 99.9% of Germs" purge, you, the lone 0.1%, will seek to repopulate and infect your great home hand.

Good Luck, Happy Infecting!!!!

-------------------------------------------------------------

For Weekly Game Jam 149 - Last One Left

-------------------------------------------------------------

How to Play:

Move mouse to move

Eat cells to grow, avoid the antibodies or take damage

Space Bar to split, can only split with a mass of 2 or more
